imdb.plot outline: David who recently got dumped by his girlfriend of four years, turns to his two best friends Pablo and Federico for support. Pablo will show him how rich it is to be in a relationship, while Federico will try to convince him that the single life is much better. David will have to decide what he wants for his future: to be a lone ranger enjoying his freedom or look a girlfriend to enjoy brunches, movie dates and snuggle sessions with.
imdb.title: Estado Civil
